# Frontend Redesign Project

**Status**: Planning  
**Priority**: Medium  
**Lead**: UI/UX Team  
**Parent**: [[../project-overview.md]]

## Goals

Modernize the user interface and improve user experience across the platform.

## Planned Features

- Responsive design for mobile devices
- Dark mode support
- Improved navigation
- Real-time search suggestions

## UI Components

- File browser with filtering
- Metadata editor
- Search interface
- Settings panel

## Technical Stack

- HTML/CSS with modern features
- HTMX for dynamic interactions
- JavaScript for complex UI logic

## Dependencies

- Backend API completion: [[backend-api.md]]
- User research completion
- Design system establishment

> Mockups and wireframes will be added here
